source_text: for its Participating Interest to revert to a 1.5% Net Smelter Return (NSR) Royalty on all minerals extracted and sold from the Tenements;
additional_details: This royalty is triggered if a Participant's (Red Hill or Peel) Participating Interest in the Joint Venture dilutes to 10% or less. The diluting Participant will receive the 1.5% NSR royalty, which will be paid by the entity extracting and selling minerals from the Tenements (the remaining Joint Venture participant(s)).
